thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 3 of 108
thread.title: UNITED STATES
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by UNITED STATES

author: UNITED STATES
title: UNITED STATES
text:
I was curious about upgrading my scope. After chatting with them, they gave me a thorough explaination of the differences in brands, models and durability of each. They were very knowledgeable about the products and knew exactly what I meant when I mentioned the issues I was having with my present tripod. Because of their knowledge and also the fact that they were cheaper than anywhere else on the internet, AND the fact that they shipped free within days, I decided to make a purchase within twenty four hours! They never pressured me and patiently answered every one of my questions to be sure I fully understood what they had and the pros and cons of each.
I've bought several items from Eagle over the years and it is a name you can trust!!! Fast efficient delivery sometimes arriving within twenty four hours!!!!
